TopicTitle: KSP: Economic Boom Videos Are Here!

Articles.Content:
<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/WqLQnwz2iho?list=PLxqkPVJ0Ejy4OPxaSlWY-9AOYzxRkKtun" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Check out your favorite <em>KSP</em> Youtubers as they get their hands on the pre-release version of <em>KSP</em> version 0.25, also known as <em>Economic Boom</em>. Want to know what’s new? Does the update contain enough excitement to fuel a hype train? Watch the videos and let them show you what the <em>KSP: Economic Boom</em> is all about.</p>

<p>Want some live interaction with your video watching? Members of the <a href="http://bit.ly/1knMaSg"><strong>KSP-TV</strong></a> team will be streaming <em>Economic Boom</em> all weekend long!</p>
Can't wait to play this update!
Man talk about teasing!
Wait...why are there CLOUDS and such a nice SKYBOX in the video header!? Probably mods, but who knows...I can't watch the video right now, am on a mobile...

Something I remember doing a while ago was something I called KSP X2, where I manually edited Ackzanders Vertical Tech Tree and DOUBLED all science node costs.

It didn't make it too much of a grind during the time I played it but probably would lead to a much more interesting and longer game, simply because my current playthrough hit max science (full stock tech tree unlocked) before I ever left the Kerbin System.
Interest levels going down again... Unless the update is very soon I'm unlikely to download it...

Interest levels going down again... Unless the update is very soon I'm unlikely to download it...

You'll download it.
I hope danny makes a video...

I liked RoninPawns video, it's like Danny with a voice. Only two complaints:

1. I want actual Danny.

2.Where did Kerbal experience go?

Also, what did Bob mean by "science in sandbox mode"? And "supersampled screenshots"?

Edited October 4, 2014 by The Jedi Master

I hope danny makes a video...

DANNY! Same here.
Heh... I like how the button to cut throttle completely is directly next to the new button for full throttle. Can't imagine how this could result in any explosive accidents...

2.Where did Kerbal experience go?

OOOOOOH YEAH! Good catch. Looks like Squad may be trying to sweep another feature under the rug.

Cargo bays

? Sweet.

"supersampled screenshots"?

Probably screenshots taken using BOSS (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/34631-0-23-Bolt-On-Screenshot-System-(BOSS)-v2-1-4). It employs supersampling to get a much higher resolution image than whatever default resolution the game is running at, at the expense of massively increasing RAM usage for a short period of time.

OOOOOOH YEAH! Good catch. Looks like Squad may be trying to sweep another feature under the rug.

MK3 and Kerbal Experience were confirmed to be delayed to 0.26 on a recent Squadcast episode.

MK3 and Kerbal Experience were confirmed to be delayed to 0.26 on a recent Squadcast episode.

Aww. Well, I don't play on career, and I prefer Mk2 planes. So it's not that much of a hit.

MK3 and Kerbal Experience were confirmed to be delayed to 0.26 on a recent Squadcast episode.

This is why you guys need a roadmap something fierce.

This is why you guys need a roadmap something fierce.

Taken from the 0.25 plan article:

Now, we want to make something crystal clear before we carry on. This is a plan, and to borrow a quote from military history; No plan survives contact with the enemy. The enemy here aren't mongol hordes, chichimeca raiders or GhandiÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s nuclear missiles (Civ 5 bitterness aside). The enemy are bugs. The enemy are features ending up not as cool or fun as they were on paper. Or art assets more complex than drafted or code conflicts. Thus, we have to adapt. Maybe a feature is cut, or a new one pops up. Or the plan for something goes into a radically different direction.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll give you a small example. The game mechanics planned for the Admin Facility in were originally far simpler (somewhat similar to the Market from Age of Empires) and not very interesting overall. We redesigned them into a proper gameplay-enhancing set of mechanics that we are confident will be much more interesting than what we had before, which wasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t much more than a UI to convert one currency into another. The bottom line is, things change, so please donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t take this list as is and understand that our ideas are likely to continue evolving. This list here has merely our current goals at the time of this post.

In short, while we clearly would have liked to include those, they didn't perform to our liking, so we're going to take more time to work on them and make sure they're in the next one.

This is why you guys need a roadmap something fierce.

according to maxmaps twitter we should be getting some form of roadmap for at least .26 after .25 is out.

EDIT: to rowsdower, if you tack on the *subject to change* disclaimer on to a roadmap, that would be great. We just all want to see what might be coming over the horizion. ideally if you drop a feature or change it, it would be addressed in the devnotes anyway.

Edited October 5, 2014 by r4pt0r

This is a plan, and to borrow a quote from military history; No plan survives contact with the enemy.

This is why you call it a plan, outline it in broad strokes or "what we'd like to work on, and why you add things to it that are confirmed and delayed. I never recall asking for a line-by-line item list of "Here is what will be done" when I originally asked for a roadmap because I know SQUAD doesn't want to do that. It's pretty obvious you guys aren't Tarn Adams, right? Can we get that straight? When I talk about a roadmap, what I talk about is ideas that SQUAD would like to investigate and features that SQUAD would like to revisit. Outlining the entirety of development in a concrete manner doesn't work for SQUAD, that's obvious, and no one has asked for that.

- - - Updated - - -

according to maxmaps twitter we should be getting some form of roadmap for at least .26 after .25 is out.

Oh, awesome! More information from some employee's personal Twitter account! I feel like I'm playing EVE-O again...

DANNY! Same here.

I will wait for Danny before playing this update

Oh, awesome! More information from some employee's personal Twitter account! I feel like I'm playing EVE-O again...

This was also vetted on other official KSP channels. I understand you're being sarcastic here, but perhaps it's not the right moment.

That said, Economic Boom's the order of the day in this thread. Back on track, shall we?

As for a vague indication of where KSP is/might be going: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Planned_features

You know of this website, I'm sure.

It is not official, I know, but it has proven to be reasonably accurate in the past, so this is likely the best you'll get.

.25 looks like it will be interesting. These Videos are not so much. Just my personal view, but an entire playlist of videos all doing pretty much the same thing? How about challenging the video jockeys to each do a deep highlight on a specific feature next time? A 3 minute vid on using the radial attachment option for example? I personally did not find a 5 min set piece play act on the runway to be very informative - I sort of tuned out. But other's seem to like it. No worries, just feedback ;-) I do not make vids myself so my attempt at constructive criticism can be safely ignored if necessary.

Basically if you've watched one, you've watched them all, and they all highlight the exact same features that have been announced and detailed already in an earlier MaxMaps video. It's been the same for as long as I've been around, very regimented. So just pick your favorite Youtuber and have a watch.
